name: MellowSounds
0:
”Alexa, open mellow sounds”
”Alexa, ask mellow sounds to play random”
”Alexa, ask mellow sounds to play moon jazz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mellow sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mellow Sounds lets you play a variety of ambient sounds and soothing melodies to help you "mellow out" into a calmer state of mind, helping you relieve stress and sleep sound. 

Why Mellow Sounds?
-No Subscriptions
-No Ads
-Updated Monthly
-24/7 Support
-ASMR & Sleep Melodies in Binaural enhanced audio format (thanks to Amazon's latest updates, you can now listen to any sound on your Alexa on multiple devices for added auditory pleasure! You can enable this on the Alexa app in Settings)

To setup Multi-Room to listen on multiple devices, visit Amazon's support link here: https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=202108910

Our application was developed by sound engineers to help bring you the best in premium sounds and melodies. 



GETTING STARTED:
1. "Alexa, Play Mellow Sounds"
2. A prompt will appear. If you're new, you can say "playlist" and it will read out list of sounds to choose from. (It will also show you a visual playlist on the official Alexa app or on Echo Show devices.) If you're familiar with the sound, simply say the name of the sound. 
3. If you're unsure, Mellow Sounds will ask if you'd like her to play a random sound for you. You can say "yes" or "no". 
4. When a sound is playing, you can say "Alexa, Next" or "Alexa, Previous" to cycle between each track.
4. Each sound loops by default. No more worries of 'sudden silence' when you're sound asleep. If you'd like for your sound/song to end at a given time, you can say "Alexa, stop in 4 hours". 
5. To end the session entirely, you can say "Alexa, cancel". Mellow Sounds will bid you a sweet farewell.



WHAT'S INCLUDED:
*Endless updates. Alot of research, sound engineering and development went into the creation of Mellow Sounds. We'll be delivering new content to you monthly.
*66 Premium Quality Sounds ranging from ASMR, soothing jazz and downtempo melodies.
*No looping commands required. You can set a timer on a sound by saying "Alexa, stop in 7 hours", or simply close out the app by saying "Alexa, cancel".
*No worries of having your sound stop and disrupt your sleep.



PREMIUM MELODIES:

African Sunset
Asian Dream
Calming Jazz
Dreamscape
Elevator Music
Latin Dream
Magic Forest
Mellow Lounge
Moon Jazz
Saxaphone
Sleep Surrender
Tranquility
Zen Garden


PREMIUM SOUNDS INCLUDED:
Airplane Cabin, Amazon Rainforest, Autumn Winds, Beer Foam, Birds of Paradise, Boat Dock, Boiling Water, Bonfire, Brown Noise, California Bay, Car Tunnel, Carolina Stream, Cave Bubbles, Cavern Fire, Chiming Wind, Cicadas, City Rain, Coffee Shop, Control Room, Crashing Waves, Crowd Ambience, Desert Wind, Dream Birds, Empty Streets, Everglades, Falling Snow, Forest River, Forest Road, Frogs, Heavy Rain, Highway, Jungle, Lava Flow, Morning Farm, Mountain River, Night Crickets, Night Owls, Ocean Pier, Space Ambience, Subway, Summer Field, Swamp, Thunderstorm, Tropical Beach, Umbrella, Vinyl Cracks, Volcano, White Noise, Wind Valley, Waterfall, Random (for a random sound or melody).



SUGGEST A SOUND:
Have a sound suggestion? Drop us a line at support@foretellis.com or visit our website: www.foretellis.com

SUPPORT AND FAQ:
https://foretellis.com/faq

SHOW SOME LOVE:
We hope you'll enjoy the calming melodies and soothing sounds Mellow Sounds has to offer. 

If you have any questions or general issues, please write us at support@foretellis.com or visit our contact page at: https://foretellis.com/contact-us and we'll make it right. Our clients matter to us.
